item.title: Understanding And Analyzing The Capacities Of Different Homeless Shelter Sectors In The Greater Toronto Area
item.description: Abstract This is a statistical analysis of the capacity of homeless shelters in the City of Toronto. This analysis aims to find the different capacities in homeless shelter sectors. This will alow for a better understanding of which sectors have excess capacities and which are struggling to meet the demand. Introduction Homelesness is a serious issue around the country and Toronto is not exempt from this. With the economic hardships of COVID-19, evictions are on the rise and will continue to rise as we wait for a vaccine.
